message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_VERIFICATION_ITEM_ALREADY_ADDED
message.locale: This verification item has already been added to this verification.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_EVIDENCE_NO_LONGER_USE
message.locale: You may not add this item to the verification as the evidence associated with it is no longer in use.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_NO_APPROPRIATE_PRIVILEGES
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to add this item to the verification.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_DATE_RECEIVED_NOT_LATER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The Date Received that you have entered must not be later than the current date.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_ENTER_NAME_FOR_PROVIDER
message.locale: You must select a case participant, a registered participant or enter a name for the provider. You must specify one of these only.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_PROVIDE_FILE_LOCATION
message.locale: You should provide either file location and reference or file attachment but not both.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_PROVIDE_FILE_LOCATION_IF_DESCRIPTION_ENTERED
message.locale: You must either attach a file or specify the file location and/or reference.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_XRV_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_EXISTS
message.locale: This verification item may not be removed as it has not been added to this verification.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_XRV_ASSOCIATED_REMOVED_VERIFICATION
message.locale: This verification item has already been removed from this verification.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_XRV_ASSOCIATED_EVIDENCE_REMOVED_VERIFICATION
message.locale: You may not remove the item from this verification as the evidence associated with it is no longer in use.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_NO_APPROPRIATE_PRIVILEGES_TO_REMOVE_ITEM
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to remove this item from the verification.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_VALUE_ENTERED_FOR_ONLY_ONE_OF_CASE_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: A value may be entered for only one of case participant,registered participant or name

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_VALUE_ENTERED_FOR_ONE_OF_CASE_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: A value must be entered for one of case participant,registered participant or name

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: A verification item cannot be added to a case with a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_ITEM_REMOVE_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: A verification item cannot be removed from a case with a status of closed.

message.name: INF_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_LISTED_MULTIPLE_TIMES
message.locale: The verification item %1s is displayed %2n times as it is configured %3n times in the application.

message.name: INF_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_LISTED_MULTIPLE_TIMES_DELETION
message.locale: Deleting the verification item %1s will delete all the %2n items displayed for this verification item.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEMPROVISION_FV_EVIDENCE_MUST_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one outstanding verification must be selected.
